description: Everyday life is about to start for the new Haibane Rakka. She learns about the human city of Guri, the wall that surrounds it (which Haibane must stay away from), the Haibane Renmei (who take care about the Haibane`s life and problems), and about other things - such as how to put on a dress or sleep at night when you have wings on your back.

titles.title: Die Stadt und ihre Mauer / Die Tooga / Der Haibane-Verband
Machi to Kabe - Tooga - Haibane Renmei
Miasto i mur; Toga; Haibane renmei
